Mandate: Provide insurance cover across public and private entities while identifying insurance fraud and suspicious underwriting behaviors.
TopPriorities: Protect public infrastructure against theft linked to fraudulent invoices.
Work with regulators to vet claims from high-risk suppliers.
Share suspicious claims data with ZRA and ACC.
ActiveOperations: Risk underwriting unit flagging clients with unexplained asset transfers.
Claims intelligence sharing with regulatory authorities.
Collaboration with reinsurers to trace unusual payout patterns.

RecentActions.Title: Published anti-fraud framework
RecentActions.Summary: Released guidelines referencing global best practices and local regulations.

Mandate: Provide insurance cover across public and private entities while identifying insurance fraud and suspicious underwriting behaviors.
TopPriorities: Protect public infrastructure against theft linked to fraudulent invoices.
Work with regulators to vet claims from high-risk suppliers.
Share suspicious claims data with ZRA and ACC.
ActiveOperations: Risk underwriting unit flagging clients with unexplained asset transfers.
Claims intelligence sharing with regulatory authorities.
Collaboration with reinsurers to trace unusual payout patterns.
